channel.title: amazon-s3 Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in amazon-s3 Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with amazon-s3
item.description: Installation of AWS CLI for accessing S3 # Installing aws cli in Ubuntu / Debian Instance sudo apt-get install -y python-dev python-pip sudo pip install awscli aws --version aws configure Installing aws cli using python Using pip you can install aws cli in windows, OS X and Linux sudo pip install awscli Configuring the AWS Command Line Interface This section explains how to configure settings that the AWS Command Line Interface uses when interacting with AWS, such as your security credentials and the default region.
